display_long_description:
#                                                                                                                                                                                                        
[media]
# **Fight Off the Ridden**
The Frenzy Virus has mutated, unleashing a new wave of chaos. You and your team must now confront hordes of "The Ridden" in Frenzy Extinction. 

[media]
# **Upgrade and Customize**
Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks. 

[media]
# **Diverse and Immersive Maps**
Explore 10 maps, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Survive in desolate cities, eerie forests, and more!

[media]
# **Epic Boss Battles**
Face off against formidable bosses throughout each map. These fights will test your skills and teamwork as you survive their special abilities. 

[media]
# **Multiplayer Mayhem**
Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract.

# **Fight Off the Ridden**
The Frenzy Virus has mutated, unleashing a new wave of chaos. You and your team must now confront hordes of "The Ridden" in Frenzy Extinction. 

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982499_874210870844905_8266732701765703080_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=VCGQWH-DRf4Q7kNvwHUpNMZ&_nc_oc=AdnNXzxU63yk86x8N7DLtl0CnEwbpP6IQDoJTEBwsrAgP1dCCQJ2uQxduz_7MAnrXzI&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=zmyil_J28HxZlMh0Y5GPzg&oh=00_AfrXfSH89sF4ikw8EGMQ96T84UQmtkLhDMQg_c8u2rUaBQ&oe=697BD6C9)
# **Upgrade and Customize**
Collect Necronium from defeated enemies to upgrade your gear, unlock new areas, and enhance your abilities with powerful perks. 

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982581_1223888319033072_3959488854512735737_n.mp4?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=ictvZoVopl0Q7kNvwFVecP1&_nc_oc=Adnxn9OwYtRZyhmfU1lFkwIOK0eFxAoZ8dpKH-XXzrKrlL9nw0pwVwlUXBwKACUohqE&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=zmyil_J28HxZlMh0Y5GPzg&oh=00_AfrCADLoTw3zLyGw_iHC3NBqeN8Qrgf08wFx6JliulKlaA&oe=697BE41D)
# **Diverse and Immersive Maps**
Explore 10 maps, each with its own atmosphere and challenges. Survive in desolate cities, eerie forests, and more!

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974548_1040387177540093_112250259871580574_n.mp4?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=1Y9qMF4IO-EQ7kNvwF56o1j&_nc_oc=AdlNvDsV9iDrPuVkXNAKIR051oQLJlElPACCjg-DPUUl3AtAeS1DBqomdjGKcM6a5Jg&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=zmyil_J28HxZlMh0Y5GPzg&oh=00_AfpugNyJffZVlQJtIJSAlMkNmg5NBC78g3VtQL81mZ2U7w&oe=697BD1D2)
# **Epic Boss Battles**
Face off against formidable bosses throughout each map. These fights will test your skills and teamwork as you survive their special abilities. 

![{"height":400,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38974628_1432121104166417_7819473213702105902_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=aS4z47FH-csQ7kNvwHx-7PE&_nc_oc=AdlcgKksbIWozM4TEqY8ZKuE2PoktqW1xHCTuZPeTlxrh_kBKRwIjWhwa3CZzdAJ9Mc&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=zmyil_J28HxZlMh0Y5GPzg&oh=00_AfrQVL-FPOGcaxvY0-joG3Wg7lnvmViiAqo5OKu3drV7EA&oe=697BEC02)
# **Multiplayer Mayhem**
Team up with up to 3 friends in seamless co-op multiplayer. Strategize and cooperate to defeat the hordes, share loot, and defeat the boss to extract.
